rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
An academic is a person who is engaged in higher education and research. This type typically includes those whose career is in academia and who work as professors and/or researchers in universities and research institutes. It can also include those that have held academic posts such as visiting professorships and research fellowships.
People who are academics:
## College/university teachers (e.g. Pat Hanrahan, Daniel T. Barry, Marco Casagrande, Rajeev Motwani).
## Anyone who has held a research post in universities, colleges and research institutions (e.g. Koh Buck Song, Martin Anderson, Maud Menten, Eliezer S. Yudkowsky).
## Visiting scholars and professors of an academic institution (e.g. Tunay I. Tunca, Ian Liddell, Al Gore).
People who are NOT academics:
## Persons engaged in non-scholarly research such as film crew researchers, market researchers and medical researchers (e.g. Lauren Abiouness, Kelley Styring, George Chaldakov).
## Primary and secondary school teachers (e.g. Patty Murray, Linda Bloodworth Thomason).
## Non-research and non-teaching employees of colleges and universities (e.g Henry E. Bliss, Tyler Chelf, Marielle Hsu, Tara Vanderveer).
## Academic administrators such as university presidents who have not held any teaching or research posts (e.g. Daniel Mark Fogel, Nobuhiro Suwa, Armin Altamirano Luistro).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.academic to the mso:education.academic he or she advises.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Advisees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic to the mso:education.academic(s) who have served as advisors.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Advisors

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic to the mso:education.academic_post(s) he or she has held.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointments

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic to the mso:education.department(s) the academic has been affiliated with.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Departments

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic to his or her mso:education.field_of_study.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Research Areas

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic to his or her g-index, which is an index for quantifying scientific productivity based on publication record.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: G-index

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic to his or her h-index, which is the measure of the productivity and citation impact of their published body of work.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: H-index

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all formalized ideas in the differing fields of study. These include theories, hypothesis, axioms, and all other kinds of concepts and frameworks for organizing the problems and explanations for observations in a given field of study.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theory

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.theory to the mso:education.field_of_study for which the theory is relevant.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field of Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all academic institution. Academic institutions are those educational institutions granting degrees, like colleges and universities.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an academic institution to the average of the high school grade point average (expressed in numeric form) of each of the students attending the academic institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: High School Grade Point Average

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an academic institution to the department responsible for maintaining official records of the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Registrar's Office

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.academic_institution to mso:education.academic_posts affiliated with this institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Visiting Scholars and Fellows

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to the text description of the year designation for the institution. This is a designation like 'Four or more Years' or 'Two to Four Years' that indicate the approximate years to a degree.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Year Designation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given academic post, including the person, institution, and dates of the post held.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Post

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic_post to the person holding the post.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Person

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic_post to the mso:education.academic_institution the post is at.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic_post to the title the person held for the post.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position or title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic_post to its start date.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.academic_post to its end date.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all academic post titles. These are the job titles associated with academic posts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Post Title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.academic_post_title to the mso:education.academic_post entities collecting data on the academics with this title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academics

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Value type collecting the data for an acceptance rate for an institution, including the rate and the year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Acceptance Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The percentage of people who applied in a given year that were actually admitted (i.e., a value between 0 and 100, where 100 means all students who applied were accepted).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The beginning year of the academic year this data is valid for. E.g., for academic year 2011-2012, enter "2011".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all athletics programs. These are the organizations that run the sports program for an organization, usually a school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Athletics Program

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the athletics associations to which the athletics program belongs.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Association

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to cheer the fans and cheerleaders use at games and rallies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cheer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the color or colors associated with the athletics program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Color

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the conference the school program is a part of.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Conference

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the division in which the school competes. Divisions in this context are the levels of intercollegiate athletics sanctioned by the NCAA.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Division

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual Property associating an mso:education.athletics_brand wo the facilities value type, which contains data about the facilities and sports played at the facility available to the athletics program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Program Facility

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the mso:music.composition that is played at games and rallies as its fight song.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Fight Song

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The educational institution that the teams under this brand play for.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the mso:sports.school_sports_team(s) that are a part of the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Teams

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.athletics_brand to the number of athletic teams associated with the school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Teams

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A value type with properties specifying the average parent income of students at an educational institution for a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Parent Income

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The average income of parents of students who attend the educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Parent Income

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The year for which the average parent income figure at a given educational institution is valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A body of officials elected or appointed to oversee a local or statewide school system or systems.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Board of Education

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A relationship type that is used to relate a high school to a score indicating the degree of preparation for college of students at the high school in a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: College Readiness Index

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a college readiness score to a high school having this score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: High School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The specified college readiness score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: College Readiness Score

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The calendar year that the high school had the specified college readiness score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: College Readiness Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A value type with properties specifying the educational cost of the institution per year for a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Cost

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the fee for submitting an application for admission to the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Application Fee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average cost of books for students enrolled full-time at the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Cost of Books per Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the average per-year, out-of-pocket cost for attending the educational institution in the given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Net Cost

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average cost per student of food services provided by the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Board Fee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The tuition per year for graduate students who are enrolled full-time and are citizens or residents of the given country or group of countries. For example, many universities offer one tuition for all students from the country the university is in, and universities in the EU have one tuition for any student from an EU country. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to citizens or residents, this property should not have a value.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Domestic Graduate Tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The tuition per year for students who are enrolled full-time and are citizens or residents of the given country or group of countries. For example, many universities offer one tuition for all students from the country the university is in, and universities in the EU have one tuition for any student from an EU country. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to citizens or residents, this property should not have a value. Note that this property is not a superproperty of education.cost.domestic_undergraduate_tuition and education.cost.domestic_graduate_tuition, because this property is an average over both graduate and undergraduate tuition.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Domestic tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The tuition per year for undergraduate students who are enrolled full-time and are citizens or residents of the given country or group of countries. For example, many universities offer one tuition for all students from the country the university is in, and universities in the EU have one tuition for any student from an EU country. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to citizens or residents, this property should not have a value.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Domestic Undergraduate Tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The tuition and fees per year for undergraduate students who are enrolled full-time and are citizens or residents of the given country or group of countries. For example, many universities offer one tuition for all students from the country the university is in, and universities in the EU have one tuition for any student from an EU country. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to citizens or residents, this property should not have a value.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Domestic Undergraduate Tuition and Fees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the amount of money that must be paid by an admitted student to secure a place in the incoming class of the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Enrollment Deposit

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the amount charged per credit hour by the given educational institution to graduate students. A credit hour is the unit of measuring educational credit, usually based on the number of classroom hours per week.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduate Per-Credit-Hour Fee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition and fees per year for graduate students who are enrolled full-time. If the university offers a discounted rate to local residents or citizens of the country where the university is located, this property should not be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduate Tuition and Fees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition per year for students who are enrolled full-time from countries outside the domestic region (which is defined differently from school to school). This property should also be used for educational institutions that do not offer a discounted rate for local or domestic students.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: International tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition per year for graduate students who are enrolled full-time and are from a region (smaller than the country) that is local to the university. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to local residents, this property should not have a value.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Local Graduate Tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition per year for students who are enrolled full-time and are from a region (smaller than the country) that is local to the university. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to local residents, this property should not have a value. Note that this property is not a superproperty of education.cost.local_undergraduate_tuition and education.cost.local_graduate_tuition, because this property is an average over both graduate and undergraduate tuition.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Local tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition per year for undergraduate students who are enrolled full-time and are from a region (smaller than the country) that is local to the university. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to local residents, this property should not have a value.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Local Undergraduate Tuition

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition and fees per year for undergraduate students who are enrolled full-time and are from a region (smaller than the country) that is local to the university. If the university does not offer a discounted rate to local residents, this property should not have a value.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Local Undergraduate Tuition and Fees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average cost per student of accommodations and food service provided by the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Room and Board Fee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average cost per student of accommodations provided by the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Room Fee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the amount charged per credit hour by the given educational institution to undergraduate students. A credit hour is the unit of measuring educational credit, usually based on the number of classroom hours per week.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Undergraduate Per-Credit-Hour Fee

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the tuition and fees per year for undergraduate students who are enrolled full-time. If the university offers a discounted rate to local residents or citizens of the country where the university is located, this property should not be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Undergraduate Tuition and Fees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: This is the year for which the cost properties of a given educational institution are valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cost Year
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This property is not needed, since the expected type of the properties on education.cost is measurement_unit.dated_money_value. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Instructional courses that are offered by educational institutions or by individuals.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Course

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to the amount of money charged to take the course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cost

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to the identifier for the course. Note that this property is multi-valued, because a course may be offered by more than one department in an educational institution with a different identifier in each department.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Course Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to the educational institution, if any, that is offering the course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to an estimate of the amount of effort, in a range of hours per week, required to complete the course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Effort

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The subject or topic of the course, e.g. algebra, biology, basket-weaving, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field of Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to a language in which the course is offered.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Language

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to the length of the course in weeks.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Length

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to a textual description of the level of the course, e.g. "introductory" or "graduate level".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Level

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to a textual description of when the course will take place, e.g. "Fall 2016" or "Spring Semester of 2016/2017 Academic Year".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offered

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to a description of the required or recommended background of students taking the course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Qualifications

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational course to a textual description of what is needed to complete the course successfully, e.g. "pass all quizzes and exams and write a term paper".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Requirements

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that stores information about the number and kind of degrees awarded by a given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degrees Conferred

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the academic year of the given educational institution for which the information about degrees conferred is valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the educational degree about which information is provided.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the academic discipline in which the given degree is awarded.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field of Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of degrees of the given kind and during the given academic year awarded by the educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Degrees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all academic departments. Departments in education are the divisions of a higher education institution devoted to a given academic discipline. The divisions are not standardized, and includes broad departments like 'Language and Literature' or more specific divisions like, 'Molecular and Cellular Biology'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Department

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Academics who have worked in or been posted to this department. There may be slight overlap between this property and a person's employment, but typically speaking a person will be employed by a university, rather than a department. It is also possible to be posted in a department as part of an academic exchange, for example.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academics

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: For former departments, the date this department was closed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date closed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this department was created.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date founded

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.department to its parent mso:education.department.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Department Of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.department to the mso:education.field_of_study taught.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an academic department to a program offered by the department.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Program

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.department to its sub-departments, also instances of mso:education.department.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subsidiary departments

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.department to its mso:education.university.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all dissertations. This is a scholarly work presenting the author's research and findings in support of gaining an academic degree or professional qualification.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Dissertation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date on which this disseration was defended.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Defense date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The degree for which this dissertation was written.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The school at which this dissertation was written.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date this dissertation was submitted. This is equivalent to the \"Date Written\" property of the Written Work type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Submission date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type collecting education data about a person and/or an educational institution, including degrees granted and majors, minors, and specializations.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Education

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.education entity to the mso:education.educational_degree received.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.education to the degree-granting mso:education.educational_institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.education to the major mso:education.field_of_study.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Major

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.education to the minor mso:education.field_of_study.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Minor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.education to any specialization mso:education.field_of_study.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Specialization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.education to the mso:people.person receiving this education.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Student

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the year that the person in question graduated from the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Year of Graduation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for kinds of degrees, e.g. 'Bachelor of Science' and 'Bachelor of Arts'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.educational_degree to the mso:education.honorary_degree(s) of this type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Honorary Degree Recipients

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
An educational institution is an organization whose primary mission is to provide formal education to students. It provides academic and/or specialized training programs at any level, including primary and secondary schools, colleges, universities, university systems, and professional and trade schools.
Things that are educational institutions:
## Institutions that provide education at any of the instructional stages such as preschool, primary, secondary, tertiary (e.g. Little Ark Preschool, Bellows Free Academy, Ellenville Middle School, Dartmouth College).
## Organizations that provide formal education through academic training (e.g. University of Melbourne, Westmont College).
## Organizations provide formal non-academic training (e.g. Sydney Institute of Tafe, Gibbs College).
## Parent institutions as well as subsidiary or constituent colleges or schools (e.g. Fordham University, Fordham University School of Law, Fordham College at Rose Hill).
## Institutions that grant online degrees through e-courses, webcasts and distance learning education programs (e.g. Open University, CU online).
## Seminaries and bible colleges (e.g. Saint Joseph Seminary College, Erskine Theological Seminary, Maranatha Baptist College).
## Military schools (e.g. Basic Military Training Centre, United States Coast Guard Training Center).
## University systems, which are sets of affiliated independent universities and colleges.
Things that are NOT Educational institutions:
## Components of an educational institution that are not themselves educational institutions, e.g. departments, cafeterias, school clinics, gymnasiums, athletic teams, fraternities, sororities.
## Orphanages and rehabilitation and correctional facilities that do not offer formal schooling (e.g. SOS Children's Villages, Camp Recovery Centers).
## Other places where informal education might be provided such as public libraries, churches, museum, mass media, etc. (e.g. Bishan Community Library, San Diego Natural History Museum).
## Organizations and agencies that provide non-formal education such as trainings, seminars and lectures such as government agencies, religious groups, and professional organizations and societies (e.g. TESDA, American Dental Association).
## Accrediting agencies and other organizations that provide professional certifications (e.g. American Institute of Public Accountants, National Architectural Accrediting Board).
## Institutions that provide only review and tutorial instructions such as those for entrance tests, board and bar exams, etc. (e.g. Sylvan Learning, Score! Education Centers).
## Hospitals whether owned/operated by educational institutions or not (e.g. Georgetown University Hospital, Duke University Hospital). Use mso:medicine.hospital for these.
## Educational institutions that exists only in fiction (e.g. Hogwarts, Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters). Use mso:fictional_universe.school_in_fiction for these.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational organization to another organization that has accredited it.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Accrediting Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a textual description of the academic considerations that are used in granting admission to the institution, e.g. certain kinds of courses in high school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Admission Considerations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a textual description of the nonacademic considerations that are used in granting admission to the institution, e.g. a certain level of participation in extracurricular activities.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Nonacademic Admission Considerations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links an educational institution to a textual description of the process of applying for admission to the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Admission Procedure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to information about the tests that are required, recommended, and/or optional for admission to the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Admission Tests

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a deadline for early admissions at the institution for the upcoming academic year. Note that this property is multivalued, because an institution may have more than one early admissions deadline.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Early Admissions Deadline

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a deadline for regular admissions at the institution for the upcoming academic year. Note that this property is multivalued, because an institution may have more than one regular admissions deadline.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Regular Admissions Deadline

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a person who graduated from the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Alumni

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its athletics program. E.g., the University of Alabama's teams have the collective brand "Alabama Crimson Tide." (Note that many institutions, especially outside of North America, do not have collective brands for their athletics teams.)
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Athletics Brand

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_insitution to the average income of parents of students who attend the educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Parent Income

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a descriptor of the structure of the academic year at the institution, e.g. semester, trimester, quarter system, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Calendar

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its mso:visual_art.color(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Colors

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that specifies whether the educational institution requires students to have a personal computer.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Computer Required

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relates an educational institution to a value type with properties specifying the educational cost of the institution per year for a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Cost

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates an educational institution to a course offered by the educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Courses

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to information about the number and kind of degrees awarded by the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degrees Conferred

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking an educational institution to information about the education offered by the institution, e.g. degrees granted and majors, minors, and specializations offered.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Education

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Campuses of this institution. A campus represents the grounds on which an educational institution is located. Most institutions will have at least one campus, and many have multiple campuses (sometimes called satellite campuses).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Campuses

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to the number of non-student lecuturers, teachers and researchers at this institution. These are typically staff members with an education/academic focus.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Faculty

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to information about the demographic make-up of faculty at a the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Faculty Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to its financial aid department.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Financial Aid Department

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to the mso:education.graduation_rate for the district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduation Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to the mso:education.honorary_degree(s) the institution has awarded.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Honorary Degrees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System ID.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: IPEDS ID

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to its learning disabilities program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Learning Disabilities Program

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its motto.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Motto

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The nickname for the students or sports teams. This is often different from (or a variant of) the mascot name -- e.g. the University of Oklahoma mascot is the Sooner Schooner; the nickname is the Sooners.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Nickname

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to the number of non-faculty employees.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of staff

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to an affiliated educational institution organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its parent institution. For example, the Yale School of Public Health's parent institution is Yale University.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Parent Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The primary or switchboard number for this institution
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Phone number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to the computing platform that is widely used and or recommended by the educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Preferred Computer Platform

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to the predominant language of instruction at the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Primary Language

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating an educational institution to its specified proficiency.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Proficiency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that indicates whether or not one can access the educational institution by public transportation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Public Transportation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to an organization, e.g. a company or a government agency, that actively seeks potential employees at the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Recruiting Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to information about the percentage of first-time, first-year students that continue for another year at the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Retention Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to information about scholarships and/or fellowships awarded to students by the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Scholarship Fellowship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Magazines published by the student body of this institution. Professionally-published magazines and journals should not be entered in this property.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School magazines

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A school's mascot may be a particular character (e.g. the University of Oklahoma's Sooner Schooner) or a general type of thing (e.g. Tiger, Bear, Spartan, etc.).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Mascot

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to the mso:education.school_newspaper(s) published by the student body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Newspaper

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its mso:sports.school_sports_team(s). Do not enter the generic name for all of the school's athletics (e.g. Chicago Maroons), since it does not represent a single team.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sports Teams

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: School Categories to which this school belongs, such as Private, Public, Primary, Secondary, College, Community College, Boarding School, National University, and so on.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links an educational institution to a standard descriptor for a kind of service offered by an educational institution, e.g. library facilities, student employment, and job placement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Service Offered

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The sexes admitted to this school, and the years these sexes have been admitted. Coeducational institutions should have two values, one for Male and one for Female.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sexes admitted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to one of its mso:sports.facilities. Facilities include stadiums for games, gyms for practices, and other places for athletics on the school campus.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sports Facility

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a sport that is offered by the institution, where the teams consist of both men and women.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Coed Sports Offered

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a sport that is offered by the institution for men, where the teams consist exclusively of men. Use education.educational_institution.sports_offered_coed for sports involving integrated teams.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sports Offered for Men

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to a sport that is offered by the institution for women, where the teams consist exclusively of women. Use education.educational_institution.sports_offered_coed for sports involving integrated teams.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sports Offered for Women

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking an educational institution to a webpage providing information about sports programs offered by the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sports Programs

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution to information about the demographic make-up of students at a the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Student Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its mso:education.student_radio_station(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Radio Station

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its subsidiary institutions (such as colleges of a university).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subsidiary Schools

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relates an educational institution to a value type with properties specifying the scores of students at the educational institution on standard tests.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Test Score

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution to its total enrollment of the entire student body.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total Enrollment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all school campuses. These are the physical locations, usually owned by the institution, where the business and activities of the school take place.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution Campus

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.educational_institution_campus to its mso:education.educational_institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all educational institution organizations. These are the organizations associated with educational institutions. It includes student organizations like clubs and after school organizations, departments and colleges within the institution, and the extra-curricular organizations like sports teams, bands, and newspaper organizations.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.educational_institution_organization to its notable alumni, persons who attended the affiliated educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Alumni

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational institution organization to the number of students in the organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Students

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration type containing standard descriptors for kinds of services offered by an educational institution, e.g. library facilities, student employment, and job placement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Service

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Services for attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: ADHD Services

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Services for students who speak English as a second language.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: ESL

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all elementary schools. These are the schools offering education for children from about the age of five.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Elementary School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for expenses for educational organizations on a per student basis.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Expenses by Student

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data on the sports facilities an athletics program uses and the sport type played at the venue.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Facility Sport Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.facility_sport_type to the athletic program using the facility specified.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Athletic Program

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.facility_sport_type to the mso:sports.facility to which the specified athletic program has access.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Facility

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.facility_sport_type to the mso:sports.sport that is played at the specified mso:sports.facility
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sport

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the demographic make-up of faculty at a given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Faculty

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the demography, e.g. African American, of the given class of faculty at the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Demographic Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the class of faculty, e.g. adjunct faculty, who have the given demography at the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Faculty Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of faculty members at the given educational institution that have the selected demographic or faculty type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all fields of study. These are the areas of knowledge organized around common research and theories.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Of Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.field_of_study to the mso:education.department(s) that offer classes in this field.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Departments

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.field_of_study to the mso:education.academic(s) known for research and teaching in this field.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academics

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.field_of_study to the mso:book.journal(s) publishing research and articles in this field.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Journals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.field_of_study to any number of mso:education.academic_concept relevant to the field.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Relevant Concept

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a field of study to a specialist that has competence in or subsidiary responsibility for the field of study. For example, a specialist in ancient Roman history would most likely have a competence in Latin.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Secondary Specialist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a field of study to a person who is an expert in this field of study. For example, this property would relate dermatology to a person who is a dermatologist.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Specialist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.field_of_study to its super disciplines. For example, Anthropology is one of the Social Sciences.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subdiscipline Of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.field_of_study to its subdisciplines.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Subdisciplines

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration of the kinds of financial aid offered by an educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Financial Aid

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains the suborganizations of educational institutions that are concerned with providing funds to students for the purpose of pursuing a program of study at the institution. These funds can be in the form of grants, loans or compensation for work performed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Financial Aid Department

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all fraternity and sorority organizations. These are organizations mainly at higher education institutions. They maybe social, academic, or professional in their primary intent.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Greek Letter Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_soroity to the mso:people.gender(s) accepted.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Accepted Genders

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to the mso:education.university with a representative chapter.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Colleges and Universities

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to its mso:visual_art.color(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Colors

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The school at which the fraternity or sorority was founded.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Founding school

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to its mso:education.fraternity_sorority_type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The mission statement of the fraternity/sorority
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Mission statement

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to the number of its chapters.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Chapters

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to the number of its colonies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Colonies

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to its official mso:organization.non_profit_organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Official Charity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority to its symbol.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Symbol

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all fraternity and sorority organization types. Entities include 'social', 'literary', and 'professional'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Greek Letter Organization Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.fraternity_sorority_type to the mso:education.fraternity_sorority with this classification.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Organizations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for a given institution's gender enrollment. This includes the gender and the dates the enrollment was valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Gender Enrollment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.gender_enrollment to the start date the gender was allowed into the given institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.gender_enrollment to the mso:people.gender allowed to enroll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Gender

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.gender_enrollment to the mso:education.educational_institution allowing the given gender to enroll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the percentage of the given gender enrolled at the given institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Gender Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.gender_enrollment to the end date the given gender was allowed to enroll.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all grade levels. These are the educational stages that cover the divisions throughout the education process. Entities include 'Third Grade' and 'Year Ten'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Grade Level

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Locations (usually countries, unless divisions of a country have very different systems) that use this grade level.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Locations used

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.grade_level to the oldest age typically enrolled in this grade.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Typical age (maximum)

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.grade_level to the youngest age typically enrolled in this grade.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Typical age (minimum)

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The percentage of students who are entering their undergraduate studies, are planning to get a bachelor degree, and complete their degree program within a specified amount of time, usually four or five years.
A property that specifies the demographic type, e.g. African American or Hispanic, for which the given graduation rate applies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Demographic Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The specified graduation rate.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduation Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The number of years of study at the university over which the graduation rate is valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduation Rate Time

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the educational institution having the specified graduation rate. Note that the expected type of this property should be changed to mso:education.educational_institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduation Rate University

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The calendar year that the university had the specified graduation rate.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Graduation Rate Year
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This property is no longer needed, because the expected type of education.graduation_rate.rate has been changed to measurement_unit.dated_percentage. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:education.graduation_rate.rate]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all high schools. These are the educational facilities providing all or part of secondary education for adolescents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: High School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting the data for honorary degrees. This includes the award date, the degree, and the recipient.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Honorary Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date on which the degree was awarded
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Awarded on

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The equivalent level of ordinary degree awarded (commonly a doctorate)
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The educational institution awarding the honorary degree
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The person who received the degree
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Recipient

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all honorary degree recipients. Honorary degrees are the academic degrees for which the institution has waived the usual requirements.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Honorary Degree Recipient

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.honorary_degree_recipient to the mso:education.honorary_degree(s) the person has received.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Honorary Degrees

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A department of an educational institution whose mission is to assist students with learning disabilities.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Learning Disabilities Program

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that specifies whether the learning disabilities program provides credit for coursework done by a student in high school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Accepts High School Coursework

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that specifies whether or not an application is required for admission to the learning disabilities program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Application Required

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of applications to the learning disabilities program received by a given date.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Applications Received

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the cost per student of the given learning disabilities program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cost per Student

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property that specifies whether or not an essay is required for admission to the learning disabilities program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Essay Required

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a learning disabilities program of an educational institution to the number of students enrolled in the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Students Enrolled

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all middle schools. These are the schools offering education for children between elementary and high schools.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Middle School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all observational studies. These are the studies that examine an variable upon subjects in which the assignment into a treated or control group is outside the control of the researcher.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Observational Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.observational_study to its mso:education.observational_study_design.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Design

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all designs for observational studies. Instances include ecological design and longitudinal design.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Observational Study Design

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Instructional courses that are offered over the Internet, either by educational institutions or by individuals.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Online Course

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The subject or topic of the online course, e.g. algebra, biology, basket-weaving, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field of Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The instructor who is teaching the online course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Instructor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A short video that provides a preview of the online course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Online Course Preview Video Source

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The university, if any, that is offering the online course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: University

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A video that is related to the online course.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Online Course Video Source

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all preschools. These are the schools offering early childhood education prior to compulsory primary school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Preschool

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A relationship type that is used to relate an educational institution to a score indicating the degree of proficiency of students at the institution in the given academic field in a given year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Education Proficiency

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The academic field for which the given institution has the specified proficiency.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Academic Field

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The educational institution having the specified proficiency.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Institution

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The specified proficiency score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Proficiency Score

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The calendar year that the given educational institution had the specified proficiency score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Proficiency Year

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains educational programs offered by educational institutions or departments within educational institutions. Some examples of programs are the Master's in Information Science at Syracuse University and the Master's in Business Administration at the Kellogg School of Management.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Educational Program

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to a description of the procedure for admission to the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Admission Procedure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to information about the test scores needed for admission to the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Admission Tests

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to information about the cost of enrolling in the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cost

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to a degree that is conferred by the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Degree

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links an educational program to an academic department that offers the program. Note that the property is multivalued, because interdisciplinary programs are offered by multiple departments.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Department

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to the expected duration of the program in years.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Duration

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to the examination schedule of the program, e.g. semester, trimester or annual.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Examination System

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to one of its fields of study. Note that this property is multivalued, because interdisciplinary programs have more than one field of study.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field of Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an educational program to a description of the requirements for admission to the program.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Qualifications

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all research studies. These are the events in which some subject is studied. It includes formalized experiments as well as scholarly study projects.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Research Study

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.research_study to a text description of its outcome.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Outcome

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.research_study to the mso:statistics.population_by_demographics that collects data about the study's population.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Population

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all residential colleges. Residential colleges are the organizations of a university that places activities within the context of a community setting, including a residence with shared dining and some autonomy within the university. Residential colleges are more organized than dormitories at other institutions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Residential College

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.residential_college to the date renovations on the college's buildings were completed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Renovations Completed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.residential_college to the number of undergraduates within the residential college.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Undergraduates

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the percentage of first-time, first-year students at a given educational institution that continue for another year at the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Retention Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the retention rate at the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rate

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the student type, e.g. full-time student or international student, for which the given retention rate applies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Student Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type collecting the data on revenue for the educational organization on a per student basis.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Revenue by Student

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that stores information about a scholarship or fellowship, e.g. the educational institution that issued it, the eligibility, and the value of the grant.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Scholarship Fellowship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the basis on which the scholarship or fellowship is awarded, e.g. "academic" or "need-based".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Criteria

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the types of students that are permitted to apply for the given scholarship or fellowship, e.g. "freshman only" or "minorities only".
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Eligibility

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of grants made available under the given scholarship or fellowship by the institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number Awarded

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the range of money granted by the given scholarship or fellowship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Range

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the type of educational grant, e.g. fellowship or scholarship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of years that the scholarship or fellowship has been awarded by the educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Years Offered

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description:
A school is an institution that provides education below the tertiary level (i.e. below the level covered by mso:education.academic_institution), including preschools and primary and secondary schools.
Things that are schools:
## Schools offering all or part of primary to secondary education. Preschools and kindergarten (e.g. Nia House Learning Center, Ivy Montessori Preschool Kitsilano).
## Primary or elementary schools (e.g. Oxford Elementary School, Eden Hills Primary School).
## Middle schools (e.g. Bettendorf Middle School, Rosa Parks Middle School).
## High schools, whether independent schools or constituent schools of larger educational institutions (e.g. Berkeley High School, Hunter College High School).
## Preparatory schools (e.g. Bellarmine College Preparatory, Devon Preparatory School).
## Vocational and technical high schools (e.g. Upper Cape Cod Technical High School, Bergen County Technical High School).
## Primary and secondary schools for adults (e.g. Adult High School, St. Patricks Adult School).
## Specialty secondary schools (e.g. Conservatorium High School, Dreyfoos School of the Arts, Hurlstone Agricultural High School).
## Schools offering special education to children (e.g. Furze Down School, Kohai Educational Centre).
## Online high schools (e.g. Primavera Online High School, EPGY Online High School (OHS)).
## School districts (e.g. Las Virgenes Unified School District, Freehold Regional High School District).
Things that are NOT schools:
## Colleges and universities that offer primary or secondary education as part of a separate institution (such as a subsidiary or constituent school) (e.g. University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign is the parent institution of University Laboratory High School of Urbana, Illinois and The University of the Philippines has University of the Philippines Integrated School as a subsidiary school. Use mso:education.academic_institution or one of its subtypes for these.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a school to the street address of the school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Street Address of School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to its average class sizes.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Class Size

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a high school to its specified college readiness score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: College Readiness

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to the highest mso:education.grade_level at the school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Highest Grade

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to the lowest mso:education.grade_level at the school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lowest Grade

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to its New Zealand Ministry of Education Institution Number.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ministry of Education Institution No. (NZ)

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to its National Center for Education Statistics ID.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: NCES School ID (US)

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a school to a web page with information about the PTSA organization of the school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: PTSA

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to its mso:education.school_district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School District

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school to its mso:education.student_teacher_ratio.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Student Teacher Ratio

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all school districts. School districts are the districts that operate the local public primary and secondary schools for the corresponding areas.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School District

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to its total enrollment.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Enrollment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to the highest mso:education.grade_level in the district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Highest Grade

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The Local Education Agency Identifier for the given school district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: LEAID (US)

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to the mso:location.location served by the district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Locations served

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to the lowest mso:education.grade_level in the district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lowest Grade

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The number of schools that make up the given school district.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of schools

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to the percentage of its students receiving a reduced price lunch.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Reduced Lunches Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:education.school_district to its mso:education.school(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Schools

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all school magazines. School magazines are the magazines that are created by organizations affiliated with a school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School Magazine

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.school_magazine to its mso:education.educational_institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School
school
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to organization.mascot. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all school newspapers. These are the newspapers created by organizations affiliated with a school.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School Newspaper

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:education.school_newspaper to its mso:education.educational_institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all school types. These are the informal grouping of schools, like 'high school' or 'Engineering'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: School Category

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains people who are specialists in a particular field, e.g. dermatologists, political scientists, philosophers, etc. Note that this type is related to but different from the type mso:education.field_of_study, which contains entities representing specialties themselves.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Specialist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the demographic make-up of students at a given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Student Body

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the demography, e.g. African American, of the given class of students at the given educational institution.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Demographic Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies a language, e.g. Spanish, spoken by the given class of students at the given educational institution.
